definitions.definition: used as part of the title of particular positions. The person who holds one of these positions is next below in authority to the person who holds the full position and can act for them:
examples: the vice captain of the team

definitions.definition: a moral fault or weakness in someone's character:
examples: Greed, pride, envy, and lust are considered to be vices.

definitions.definition: illegal and immoral activities, especially involving illegal sex, drugs, etc.:
examples: The chief of police said that he was committed to wiping out vice in the city.
